alert.note: Alert for Baldwin Peninsula and Selawik Valley (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued September 04 at 2:24AM AKDT until September 04 at 9:00AM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM AKDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Large breaking waves will wash surf to the top of the beach. * WHERE...Baldwin Peninsula and Selawik Valley. * WHEN...Until 9 AM AKDT this morning. * IMPACTS...Localized beach erosion will occur. Items left on the beach may wash away. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Northwest winds gusting to 40 mph through Monday morning. These winds will cause high surf to develop. The highest surf and worst conditions will along northwest facing shores such as near Shishmaref. Winds and surf will decrease by late Monday morning.
info.instruction: Precautions should be taken to protect property.
